tan.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to make animal skin into leather by treating it with tannin (=a kind of acid)
tan.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: the attractive brown colour that someone with pale skin gets after they have been in the sun
tan.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: I wish I could get a tan like that.
tan.translation[2].definitions[1].defini: having darker skin after spending time in the sun
tan.translation[2].definitions[1].exampl: She arrived home tan and rested.
